title: Drawing, "The Ten-Deck House", 1928
medium:
Graphite on white wove paper
Support: paper
provenance: Max Protetch Gallery, NYC; R. Buckminster Fuller
creditline: Museum purchase from Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Fund
description: Multi-leveled tower-like building supported by cables.  Depicted in a dynamic and vigorous swooping, diagonal orienttion from the lower right to the upper left.  Three binder holes along left edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Ten-Deck House", 1928.
1928. Graphite on white wove paper
Support: paper. Museum purchase from Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Fund. 1991-53-2.
